description: Detects DCShadow via create new SPN
false_positives: Valid on domain controllers; exclude known DCs
name: Possible DC Shadow Attack
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND ((winlog.event_id:"4742" AND winlog.event_data.ServicePrincipalNames:*GC\/*) OR (winlog.event_id:"5136" AND winlog.event_data.AttributeLDAPDisplayName:"servicePrincipalName" AND winlog.event_data.AttributeValue:GC\/*)))
author: Ilyas Ochkov
oscd.community
Chakib Gzenayi (@Chak092)
Hosni Mribah
